Never-Ending Man: Hayao Miyazaki

Ano: 2016

IMDb ID: tt6848624

Classificação: 6.8

Sinopse: A handheld camera follows Miyazaki Hayao, the powerhouse behind the famous Ghibli Studio, and his colleagues immediately before and after his retirement and captures his transition from full-time and full-length features to other projects and how the man envisions the transition from sketching by hand to CGI animation. In the process the camera captures the man's fastidious attitude, work ethic and thoughts on work and immortality.—aghaemi
